Not only did Kerry not get the spike in poll numbers as most candidates do following a National Convention, some polls are showing him lossing ground. Bush on the other hand has seen an increase in the polls. It's a shame the DNC did not go on for a few more days. They are starting to scare away their own people. 
 
 And how about that Mrs. Kerry! Is she out of touch or what? She can't even identify a bowl of chili! What a circus.
 
 I predict a blow out come election day. If I am wrong then I invite all of you here to throw this prediction back in my face.
